title: Memberships | Tan Academy of Balance Inc.
description: Find out about Tan Academy of Balance Inc. memberships and benefits
text:
Language: English EN English
Français
中文
Español
Memberships
Welcome! We are pleased you are here to continue to thread our community together. We currently have one Membership type (with sub-types) in our group Hub: Network Member - Foundation Levels of Balance Acupuncture and Practice Directory Listing. This included not only the maintenance of your practice listing, but also coupon codes for events. More importantly, it also is private access to a supportive community that speaks the same language to learn and grow with!
HUB Network Member
HUB Network Member - Foundation Levels of Balance System Acupuncture (1+2) and Practice Directory Listing.
Private and secure learning, network, community resources. Practice Directory Listing. Special discount coupons for events. Nominal lifetime fee. Interact directly with Shifu, the Laoshi's and like-minded professionals that speak the same language and strive for growth! Certified Network Member
Certified Balance System Acupuncture (BSA) Practitioner Network Members - Current in-process and Certified BSA Practitioners and Practice Directory Listing.
Nominal and lower lifetime fee as part of the Certificate program/Certified practitioner. Private and secure learning, network, community resources. Practice Directory Listing. Special discount coupons for events. Interact directly with Shifu, the Laoshi's and like-minded professionals that speak the same language and strive for growth! Thank you for subscribing to the newsletter. You have been added to our list and will be hearing from us soon.
To complete the registration process, please click the link in the email we just sent you. Welcome to Glue Up. We are upgrading our password strength service in order to align with ISO27001 standards. Please take a moment to upgrade your password.
